General.Name: RoyalTek Co Ltd
General.Description: RoyalTek Company Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells global positioning system (GPS) products worldwide. Its products primarily include audio video navigation systems, portable navigation devices, driving assistance systems, driving video recorders, electronic accessories for automobiles, and engine boards for GPS. The company also offers ODM/OEM services for car electronics and driver assistance systems. It serves automotive, navigation, safety, leisure, sports, multimedia, mountaineering, tourism, and other industries. RoyalTek Company Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.40, Wenhua 2nd Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 333010
